name: Prague Dawn Photography Walk
description: Good physical condition recommended. One third of this route is uphill and it offers the possibility to see empty streets with lit lanterns. Our journey begins and ends in front of the parking elevator at Alsovo Nabrezi 10, close to the Staromestska station (accessible via Metro, tram lines 17, 18 and night tram 53). On the route we can capture various objects of Prague: Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, Old Town towers, Lesser Quarter churches, Kampa, John Lennon Wall, Devil’s Channel, Strahov Monastery, Petrin hill.
